sense.gloss: reference (e.g. to a dictionary, passage, footnotes), consultation, comparison

sdata.j: さらに↑詳↑↓くわ↓しくは１６ページ|↑参照|↑↓さんしょう↓。

sdata.e: Writers often refer to a dictionary.

sdata.e: I often refer to the dictionary.

sdata.j: ↑疑問↑↓ぎもん↓があれば、このガイドブックを|↑参照|↑↓さんしょう↓してください。
sdata.e: If you have some questions, please refer to this guidebook.
